attributes.action: Ban the teaching of Religion in State Schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religion is merely a belief system that some people buy into. It is merely an opinion held. Awareness of Religion is fine, however Muslim Schools, Catholic Schools etc etc are divisive and promote intolerance to the ideal cohesive wider society as a whole.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
